This is one of the reasons I’m such a fan of @eleven_ty. It’s an elegant tool for rapidly generating your HTML. (That stuff web browsers were built to understand and have been optimising for, for 30 years) I love JavaScript, but like that Eleventy is BYOJS. https://t.co/XeAXH26QFz
